creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: right: 自摺　大正拾五年作　日本アルプス十二題の内　立山別山 {jizuri, Taishō jūgonen saku, Nihon Arupusu jūni dai no uchi, Tateyama betsuzan} | bottom, in pencil: Tateyama Betsuzan | Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with embossing
portfolio: Twelve Scenes in the Japan Alps (Nihon Arupusu jūnidai no uchi 日本アルプス十二題の内)
title: Tateyama Betsuzan
